sentence.Network_en: The anomalistic year is the time between successive transits of the Earth through the perihelion.
sentence.Network_cn: 近点年是地球连续两次通过近日点之间的时间.

sentence.Network_en: In the real - life world, natural scenes always have plenty of surface textures and anomalistic shapes.
sentence.Network_cn: 在现实世界中, 自然景物常常具有极其丰富的表面细节和不规则的表面外形.

sentence.Network_en: According selecting anomalistic information, the geochemical and geologic info reflected by each element were analysed.
sentence.Network_cn: 通过异常信息的筛选, 分析了各元素异常反映的地球化学及地质信息.
